purpose: Enable AI agents to work together effectively as a team, enhancing collaborative problem-solving capabilities.
principle: Builds on multi-agent systems and coordination frameworks to simulate human-like collaboration among AI agents.
reusability: Offers a modular framework that can be integrated with various AI models and data sources, supporting custom agent configurations.
limitations: Currently in alpha stage with potential stability issues; limited documentation on scaling and real-world application scenarios.
name: team-of-ai-agents
description: Open-source framework to make AI agents' team collaboration as effective as human collaboration.
highlight: Facilitates seamless collaboration among AI agents to mirror human team dynamics.
